required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Nutrients Composition of Breast Milk of Chinese Lactating Mothers and Their Nutrition Intake
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Nutrients Composition of Breast Milk of Chinese Lactating Mothers and Nutrition Intake of Chinese Pregnant and Lactating Mothers, Infants and Young Children

brief_summary.textblock: To understand breast milk composition during different lactating stages.

primary_outcome.measure: Primary outcome is the macronutrient composition of breast milk in Chinese lactating mothers from 0 to 270 days after delivery.
primary_outcome.description: Macronutrient composition includes calories (kcal/ml), total protein, fat and carbohydrate (lactose) content in breast milk.

secondary_outcome.measure: Other nutrient composition in breast milk of 0-270 days after delivery.
secondary_outcome.description: Beside macronutrient composition, all major minerals, vitamins will be analyzed. In addition, functional compounds, such as human milk oligosaccharides (HMOs), total/free amino acids, lipid profiles, and microbiota, will be analyzed as well.

secondary_outcome.measure: Dietary pattern of lactating mothers of 0-270 days after delivery.
secondary_outcome.description: A one-time standardized 24-hour food recall survey, is utilized to access dietary pattern of subjects.

secondary_outcome.measure: Nutrients intake and adequacy of lactating mothers of 0-270 days after delivery.
secondary_outcome.description: A one-time standardized 24-hour food recall survey, is utilized to access nutrient intakes and adequacy (by comparing existing local and international RDAs and DRIs databases).

secondary_outcome.measure: Nutrition supplements intake status of lactating mothers of 0-270 days after delivery.
secondary_outcome.description: A one-time food frequency questionnaire (FFQ), designed to access nutritional supplement usage, is being utilized.

clinical_study.condition: Focus of Study is Healthy Chinese Lactating Mother 0-270 Days

study_pop.textblock: Healthy Chinese lactating mother 0-270 days after delivery (inclusive) will be enrolled.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Chinese lactating mother 0-270 days after delivery (inclusive).
- Healthy with neither acute disease nor history of hereditary disease, gestational diabetes, hypertension, other concomitant diseases, and disability.
- Parents/ caregiver is willing to comply with the study procedure.
- Having received oral and written information about the aims and procedures of the study.
- Having obtained the her informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who are currently taking, or have taken in the last 4 weeks, or will take any medication.
- Subject who has history of psychopath and have no the dietary memory.
- Subjects who are suffering food allergy.
- Insufficient breast milk output according to the corresponding period after delivery.
- Alcoholic.
- Smokers.
- Subject who cannot be expected to comply with the study procedures.
- Currently participating or having participated in another clinical trial during the last 4 weeks prior to the beginning of this study.
